short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bolds the first two letters of every word on any webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
At Hocus Focus, our mission is to build a more accessible, intuitive, and engaging web reading experience for over 15 million people in the US living with ADHD, and the countless millions of others that remain undiagnosed.

In a world of endless distractions, we're building a tool that helps you focus when it matters.
